Articles.Content:
I repeat kraken attack my probe at deep space during voyage to planet red (duna)..

 

when I'm checking my probe bound to planet red.. Monitor went black then I close ksp.exe and open again.. My probe is gone.. Lost contact..

 

sadly I don't have screen shot during the attack.. I build new probe for my duna system contracts..

 

I just want to inform you all my fellow kerbalnauts.. Save before do something..
